thread.title: Government Servants as University Fellows

author: tribuneindia.com
title: Government Servants as University Fellows
text: IN connection with the Committee lately appointed by the Calcutta University consisted by 16 members of whom eight were Europeans, including the Director of Public Instruction and the redoubtable Dr. E.R. Watson who had called for an enquiry into the "cause and significance of an alarming increase in the percentage of passes." This irrepressible doctor had also given notice of his intention to move at the meeting of Faculties on the 25th September a resolution to the effect that the committee already appointed should be required to submit an interim report on his pet proposal, viz., "the cause and significance of the alarming increase in the percentage of passes, &c."
